Question: This person has three sisters, Virginia, Mary Joan (a nun, who taught at a Chicago high school), and Pauline.
Hints: In the mid-1960s, this person appeared on The Dean Martin Show 24 times, and on The Ed Sullivan Show eight times.
This person is the uncle of former Saturday Night Live castmember Paul Brittain.
This person himself "warmed up" the studio audience with a five-to-eight-minute routine before the filming of every episode.
